pageText.title: Carbon fluxes across countries and regions from inland water sources
pageText.infotext: Present-day inland water carbon flux estimates in Tg C yr-1 from 3 inland sources (Rivers, Lakes, and Estuaries) for 3 latitude bands and 6 regions. Stacked bars show breakdown by country for each region. Data sources: Hastie et al. (2018), Lauerwald et al. (2015), Laruelle et al. (2013), Raymond et al. (2013), and Regnier et al. (2013).
pageText.subtitle: Total inland water carbon fluxes: 1292.0 Tg C yr<sup>-1</sup>
